Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is not clear whether Donald Trump actually said, "Laziness is a trait in blacks ... I believe that. No black person will be president again any time soon."
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that Donald Trump made a racist statement about laziness and black people.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by Donald Trump himself, where he stated that there won't be another black president for generations because of the poor performance of his predecessor, Barack Obama.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Donald Trump did not utter the full statement as attributed to him.
Understate: The claim may understate the actual statements made by Donald Trump by only focusing on the mention of laziness and black people.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting different sources and explanations, making it difficult to determine the veracity of the statement.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the statement by presenting it as a definitive belief of Donald Trump rather than a possible interpretation or attribution.
